com.facebook.buck.core.graph.transformation

Interface TransformationEnvironment<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>


  • public interface TransformationEnvironment<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>
    A computation environment that AsyncTransformer can access. This class provides ability of Transformers to request and execute their dependencies on the engine, without exposing blocking operations.

    The implementations of this environment should have all methods as tail recursive and unblocking.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Used to wait for completion of a list of CompletionStage and apply a function asynchronously on the results
      CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluate(ComputeKey key, Function<ComputeResult,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
      Method used for AsyncTransformer to get dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.
      CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluateAll(Iterable<ComputeKey> keys, Function<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
      Method used for AsyncTransformer to get multiple dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluate(ComputeKey key,
                                        Function<ComputeResult,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
        Method used for AsyncTransformer to get dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key of the dependency to execute
        asyncTransformation - the async function to perform after dependency has completed
        Returns:
        a Future of the result of applying asyncTransformation to the completed dependency result

      • evaluateAll

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> evaluateAll(Iterable<ComputeKey> keys,
                                           Function<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>,ComputeResult> asyncTransformation)
        Method used for AsyncTransformer to get multiple dependency results, and then construct the ComputeResult for the current requested Key with the supplied asyncTransformation using the dependency result.
        Parameters:
        keys - The keys of the dependency to consume
        asyncTransformation - The function to run after all dependencies are completed, where the result of dependencies are given as a map of the keys to the result
        Returns:
        a future of the result of applying asyncTransformation to the dependencies

      • collectAsyncAndRun

        CompletionStage<ComputeResult> collectAsyncAndRun(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,CompletionStage<ComputeResult>> toCollect,
                                                  Function<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>,ComputeResult> thenFunc)
        Used to wait for completion of a list of CompletionStage and apply a function asynchronously on the results
        Parameters:
        toCollect - a map of CompletionStage to wait for
        thenFunc - the function to run after completion
        Returns:
        a CompletionStage for applying asynchronous operations on the collected futures
